entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wiarton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 08:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
